Including various options shared for coping, plus bonus in learning how to expand your own consciousness. We discuss, coach or chat, with our audience and with various guests, who are seen as leaders of change, where change has been embraced, is prevalent and working well. Uncovering and sharing the many varied ways and means for improving inner-balance, joy and creating authenticity of our live's life within. episodic no How You Communicate is How You Succeed Charlotte D. Blignaut | Solid Gold Studios From Solid Gold Studios welcome to Emotion in Motion Gavin Kennedy | Solid Gold Studios emotioninmotion@solidgoldstudios.co.za Charlotte D Blignaut, Emotion in Motion, hidden genius superpower, another Solid Gold podcast, Gavin Kennedy Charlotte D Blignaut | Solid Gold Studios 2 1 Are your Mindsets keeping YOU, YOUR Business, YOUR Life super small? Did you know - Neuroscience proves, you can change the mindsets that want to?

DID YOU KNOW - Challenging your own Mindsets has never been this easy. Its about your perspective and its about the parts of you that truly DESIRE behaviour and thinking changes. You can relearn how to think. But you have to be willing to have fun, laugh at self and with self, and be open to embracing an open mind. AND if Self Mastery and Self Actualisation is what you aspire to, then this is a podcast you do not want to miss! Is that you? Do you want to become more profitable as a person? Do you want to love and live openly with your Hidden Genius SuperPower? Your comments and feedback are encouraged! Together we can do anything! Together we are stronger!

For more information visit SolidGoldStudios.co.za/emotioninmotion
